phrases: If you are not paying attention, be prepared for a poking attack from my fingers
I am little, but I will squish you; you are as tiny as a flea to me
What I want is a plastic heart (plus, plus, but it is a minus)
But that is boring; when I would notice it, I would have won against you
Love is something that is bittersweet
Simple and clear yet complex and strange stuff
I am only worrying about things that do not matter
You are gentle and sincere yet eccentric
I pretend to be strong all over and compete against you
Just by being honest, it is so stimulating and I feel dizzy
I get hurt, I hurt you, in a preparation of pure feelings
In my head, there is always a pre-parade of pure feelings all by myself
Then let us put salt on
Because I want you to know more about me
More than anyone else, I want to bare my self
But I cannot do it, I have got nothing for experience
But a love that is just sweet
Is slightly different from what I am seeking
If I am told it is white
I would say it is black
I say one thing but do another
If I am told, I love you
I would say, I hate you
I am happy, but what am I saying?
Ami-chan, does that mean you took it?
It is still a job, after all.
By big, do you mean it was as big as this?
What are you talking about that is big?
Do not tell me you are talking about pe -
I have to take pictures with a super-huge dog for a magazine shoot.
Oh my gosh, what did you mistake it for?
Somehow, you do not look too well.
Now, let us begin the final homeroom session before we go home.
Class President, please give your instructions.
Somehow, things are not going well...
But let us cheer up, okay?
it is the long-anticipated student council president election.
Kitamura-kun, cheer up and give it your best shot, okay?
You are the number one candidate for it.
Actually, you are the only one.
Let us make it more exciting!
But it is already decided that the next president will be Kitamura.
I am not going to run for it.
I am resigning my seat as vice-president.
I am quitting the student council.
I am quitting... I am quitting...
In the end, Kitamura did not reply.
He said he is quitting the student council.
Were you bullied by that evil student council president?
He is not even responding to us.
That is why we want to ask the people who are closest to him.
I cannot believe there are still people who express themselves like this.
I do not know, and I cannot even comprehend it.
Besides, he has already left the student council.
What he does has nothing to do with me anymore.
Sensei, you are wasting your time on that idiot.
Kanou-senpai, are not you getting colder and colder?
I bet that you are the reason why Yuusaku has gone bad.
But if that is the case, I will be even more disappointed in him.
Ami-chan, have you found out why Maruo is like that?
Nope, but I think the student council president knows.
I have brought the mastermind here!
Last night, Kitamura called me and asked me how to dye his hair blonde,
You saw what Kitamura-kun was like yesterday, right?!
Did not you question why he was asking you that?
But I never thought he would really do it...
Is Maruo really quitting the student council?
Let us try and do something for Maruo's sake.
That self-proclaimed honour student is doing this to get people's attention.
He is probably trying to say, Has anyone noticed that I am deeply troubled?
and yet he dyes his hair blonde to show people that he is gone bad.
Do not tell me you are not worried about Kitamura-kun.
What use is there to worry about him?
It will just make us look like idiots.
Both of you, cut it out.
I said I am going home.
People who think someone is bound to help them if they shout loudly are very lucky.
I was thinking that we should visit Kitamura's house.
I do not have club activities or work today, and I am worried about him.
Never mind, I think it will be easier to talk to him with less people.
Then, Takasu-kun, wait for me at the gates.
I will be back after going to the club activity room.
Although I am really worried about him, I am no help at all.
Besides, I really want Kitamura to quit the student council...
He has to be separated from that stinking president.
It would be great if Kitamura-kun is at home.
I have no idea what is going on with him...
I am just wondering what is going on with Kawashima and Taiga, so...
Kawashima has not said anything like that to her childhood friend before, has she?
I think Amin is definitely worried about Kitamura-kun.
Look, Amin works in the world of adults,
so I think she knows a lot more than we do.
She surely knows about Kitamura-kun, too.
But having things only she knows,
she must be really patient to deal with kids like us.
But I do not think Amin is wrong.
There are not a lot of people in the world who can talk about their friends like that.
That is why I think Amin has her own reasons for being so direct today.
Or should I say, I wished for her to do it.
I should not say this, but there are a lot of things you do not know.
For example, not being able to understand someone you want to understand.
But I think Amin has considered all of it already.
But I think... that is why we are his final salvation.
I think Kitamura-kun's house is over there.
You are a very kind person.
In the end, Kitamura was not at home,
so we did not get to see him.
Yasuko-san let me in, so I did -
Actually, I ran away from home...
Aisaka, do you usually come here?
Ya-chan said I am allowed to eat here whenever I want,
s-so I am just going along with her good will.
It must be great to live near Takasu.
Ah, tatami mats sure are great.
I do not have tatami rooms in my house.
M-My house is fully western too!
Well, Japanese style is the best.
All right, I will help you peel them.
You just want to show off your good side, right?
So, let us make that tasty fried egg again!
Yeah, put the egg in the pan and close the lid...
What other lids are there apart from frying pan lids?
Now add a bit of water.
Actually, I am not that good at cooking -
It still tastes like fried egg.
Thank you for making it to cheer me up.
Oh, this must be Takasu's beef patty!
Yeah, it has my special red wine sauce.
I will try and make it next time...
Sure, I do not think there will be a problem if Takasu teaches you.
So, tell us what is up with your hair.
I do not want to be the student council president anymore.
No one will have any expectations if my hair is like this.
Y-You do not need to push yourself to be the student council president!
After all, it is what you have decided by yourself!
Hey Ryuuji, take the video games out!
Tomorrow is the weekend, so let us play to our heart's content!
Ryuuji, I want to eat ice cream...
I will go to the convenience store.
Oh, he went inside to sleep in a futon by himself.
I am going to look at Kitamura-kun's sleeping face...
Here, it is cold, so put this on...
I did not realise any of it.
When I was in trouble, Kitamura-kun would always reach his hand out for me.
Because of that, I was able to console myself...
He told me, You can live...
You can live in this world.
Taiga, look at the Big Dipper.
Those stars look like they are close to each other,
but they are actually very far away, right?
We learned that in elementary school.
It is like Kitamura-kun and I.
The things you see are not always real.
How hard must I try to be able to understand the hidden truth?
You want to understand him because you do not understand him, right?
You want to understand because you like him.
You reach out your hands so you will gradually get closer to it.
I drank the milk in the freezer.
It looks like you had a lot of fun last night.
You should have woken me up.
I had a feast with Taiga last night.
Oh, it is already this late.
I will make breakfast right now.
Never mind, she is fast asleep.
Do not tell me you saw me sleeping!
I am sorry, but I did.
You saw my weird sleeping face...
He saw such an awful side of me...
All right, let us go have fun!
I was busy the whole time because of the cultural festival,
so it is been a long time since I went out to have fun.
Kitamura sure is a weird guy.
This really is the best; sweating it out as a healthy student!
No matter how you look at it, it is a sickness.
Takasu, it is your turn next.
I will hit it for sure.
Aisaka, do not spread your arms.
I might have discovered our next star player!
Why is someone so talented like you not in the baseball club?
That was an awesome home run!
Ryuu-chan, can you help me hold Kitamura-kun still?
Yes, do not let him go.
Your father gave me a call.
so I thought it would be best for you to go home normally.
So you have teamed up with my parents against me...
In the end, guardians are just guardians!
You are going to become the student council president, right?
So dying your hair blonde is a no-no.
I am not going to become the student council president!
I wonder if Kitamura-kun made it home safely...
I think he is serious about it.
Do you remember what Minorin said during the summer at the villa?
She said she loves horror, so that is why she says she hates it.
Kitamura-kun says that he does not want to become the student council president...
I wonder if he means the opposite...
Even if that is the case,
we cannot do anything about it with him as he is right now.
So we have to get his spirits up, huh?
Yeah, I have decided on it.
I will announce it right now.
When I, Aisaka Taiga, am elected to become the student council president,
this school, your high school life, and your memories of this election...
When I am elected to become the student council president, everyone will be in a pit of terror.
Hurry and shake hands with me.
